mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, u.name, b.content, b.hit, TO_CHAR(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') reg_date, b.user_no FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES(seq_board_no.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, default, sysdate, #{user_no})
mapper.select: SELECT u.name, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.title, b.content, b.user_no, b.no FROM board b, users u WHERE b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE no = #{no}
